TopicTitle: Any good 0.13.3 mods that still has working download links?

Articles.Content:
(Yes, i know 0.13.3 is outdated)

I have tried downloading mods for 0.13.3 but all the good mods i saw had broken download links. Are there any ways to download those mods or any mods without broken download links?

Probably not. 0.13.3 was released about 5 years ago IIRC, in that time the "main" mod hosting site changed twice ([first one whose name I can't remember] -> [second one whose name is apparently censored because it became a malware hosting site] -> Spacedock). You may have better luck with mods hosted on different sites (eg: Curse and Github which usually keep track of the older releases) or file hosting services (Dropbox...).

Mind that most mods you may come across on the forums simply did not exist back then.

May I ask why sticking with 0.13.3?

Edited October 22, 2017 by Gaarst

0.13.3 was a demo, which means it doesn't support mods. At least that's what I've heard.

As for finding mods from that long ago, I would dig around github and the oldest threads in Add-on Releases. 

Keep in mind that some of the best mods from that era have been incorporated into the sock game, and almost none are still being maintained by the same people.

I've searched on Curse and it seems like there aren't any 0.13.3 mods, the oldest mods i could find were from 2014.

The oldest threads on Add-on Releases has broken links.

Also, how do i search 0.13.3 mods on GitHub?

I guess i might try installing new mods to see if a part of them work in 0.13.3 (thinking emoji)

1 hour ago, Redach said:

I guess i might try installing new mods to see if a part of them work in 0.13.3 (thinking emoji)

Hi that will not work,  back then the method of installing  mods was completely different.  As was the structure of a mods files. not even the cfg's are the same ,  non of the part modules will work , so that s pretty much everything in a modern part cfg. Give it up.
